sources.title: "President Roosevelt's Fourth of July Oration" (1903)
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems "President Roosevelt's Fourth of July Oration" is a very short documentary.  The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of Billy Bitzer, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. Let's all give our thanks to the Library of Congress for preserving this film and making it available to the public. Directed by                       unknown Cinematography by         Billy Bitzer Starring                             unknown Distributed by                   Biograph Company Release date                      July 1903 Country                             United States Running time                    3 m.
